item.title: Compare Multiple Projects with this GitHub Stats tool
item.description: If you have project code hosted on GitHub, chances are you might be interested in checking some numbers and stats such as stars, commits and rull requests. You might also want to compare some similar projects in terms of the above mentioned stats, for whatever reasons that interest you. We have the right tool for you: the simple and easy-to-use little tool calledÂ GitHub Stats. Let’s dive right in to what we can get out of it.
